name: Additional Mana
description: You gain two additional mana each time you purchase this skill.
icon: Two swirling motes of magic

name: Additional Spell
description: Your character learns an additional spell each time you purchase this skill.
icon: Book with pentagram on the cover

name: Battle Mage
description:
Your character may wear medium armour and cast spells, provided the character is wearing a circlet. 

You may wield polearms. You may use polearms to deliver any Combat spells you know. These effect calls must be preceded by the Magic call. They take effect even if striking a shield or weapon.
icon: Swirling staff with energy trails

name: Bloodmage
description: During each Conflux, a number of times equal to your Max HP, you may turn your own hitpoints into personal mana at a 1:1 ratio. Doing so requires 5 seconds of appropriate roleplay per point of health lost.
icon: Bleeding pentagram

name: Magus
description:
You gain four mana and learn the following spells:
- Channel Waystone
- Create Bond
- One spell of your choice.
icon: Pentagram with front facing palm hand in the middle

name: Additional Energy
description: You gain an additional energy per purchase.
icon: Lightning bolt over silhouette of running person

name: Archer
description: You may use a bow and carry arrows. You must complete the additional archery clearance.
icon: Bow and arrow

name: Armoured
description: You may wear heavy armour.
icon: Plate armour torso and shoulders

name: Bladehand
description: You may wield a one handed or short weapon in each hand.
icon: Two hands holding knives

name: Bulwark
description: You may wield a shield.
icon: Shield

name: Deathless
description: Increases your bleed out time by one minute per purchase.
icon: Skull

name: Hand-and-a-half
description: You may strike opponents while wielding a great weapon in a single hand. While doing so, your other hand still counts as occupied for the purposes of wielding weapons, casting spells or using skills.
icon: Close up of sword grip, top hand gripping it, second hand open

name: Impaler
description: You may use a thrusting polearm or spear. You must complete the additional thrusting weapon clearance.
icon: Large spear

name: Juggernaut
description: You gain an additional hitpoint per purchase.
icon: Heart over swole guy tensing

name: Stay With Me
description: You may spend five seconds and one point of energy interacting with a character who is bleeding out. That character returns to one hitpoint. If you are attacked or attack during this period of time the skill fails. You must be able to touch your target for this to function.
icon: Hand reach down to grab another hand reaching up

name: Weaponmaster
description: You may wield Greatweapons and Polearms.
icon: Tip of halberd

name: Mender
description:
You may offer first aid to characters who are bleeding out. While doing so the characters bleedout time is paused. You may move this character. You may not use this skill on yourself.

After thirty seconds of roleplay you may return that character to a single hitpoint. This process requires two hands, your full attention, appropriate roleplay and for both characters to remain stationary.
icon: Slightly unrolled bandage

name: Surgeon
description:
This skill allows for several actions to be performed at your choice. These actions cannot be combined together, each duration must be performed separately. These actions require two hands, your full attention, appropriate roleplay and for both characters to remains stationary. You cannot be perform these actions on yourself.

Broken Limb: You may spend two minutes performing appropriate roleplaying treating a character who has been affected by ‘Fracture’. After two minutes that limb is restored to normal function.

Rest Easy: If you spend at least three minutes treating a character who is Terminal then you may allow the character to act as if they are not in pain.

Surgery: If you spend at least five minutes treating a character who is wounded then they regain all lost hitpoints after a further ten minutes of rest and relaxation. This roleplaying can only be performed in a tent or similar building suited for use as a surgeon's chamber.

Herbal Remedy: You can apply medical herbs directly to a patient to treat them. You must spend 30 seconds interacting with your patient to apply a herb. This can be performed while performing treatment with the Mender Skill. Herb details can be found on the Herb card or in Appendix: Herbs.

Wound Treatment: You may open traumatic and spiritual wound cards to reveal the cure required. Any cures must be completed within a similar location to Surgery as listed above.
icon: Bandage with scissors and scalpel

name: Artisan
description:
During the downtime between events you may craft up to three magical items using the materials you have in your possession.
This skill grants you four magical item recipes automatically. You can only craft items that you have learned the recipes for. You may only craft one item of each rarity per downtime. You begin play with one Journeyman item you are able to craft, or three Artisan’s Oil if you do not know any Journeyman item recipes. Characters can learn crafts of any rarity.
icon: Hammer hitting against anvil

name: Apothecary
description:
You may craft potions during Concord events by spending a few moments roleplaying the process and exchanging the required resources with the Concord Crew at the main operations tent for the appropriate potion card.

You know how to craft three potions and can take the extra recipe skill to learn how to make additional potions.
icon: Potion viles in front of herbs

name: Mastercrafter
description: You may craft an additional expert or masterwork artisan craft during each downtime. You must still pay for them as standard.
icon: Two hands holding hammers, pressed together at the knuckles

name: Extra Craft
description: You learn an additional two crafting plans for use with the Artisan skill. Characters can learn crafts of any rarity.
icon: Book with anvil on the cover

name: Extra Recipe
description: You learn an additional two potion recipes to be used with the Apothecary skill.
icon: Book with potion vile on the cover

name: Divine Lore Anarch
description:
This skill applies for Anarch, the Sphere of Elemental Chaos. This skill allows you to take part in Ceremonies of that Sphere. You may expend crystal mana equal to your ranks in a particular lore towards ceremonies of that lore. Characters may not have more than two different Divine Lores at any one time, but they can have as many ranks in each as they like.

Each rank also allows you to master two ceremonies from within your Sphere. Your Divine Lore rank is considered doubled for ceremonies you have mastered. You do not need to select these ceremonies when you purchase the skill, instead you mayleave the ‘slots’ free and choose the ceremonies you want later if you wish.
icon: Six orbs surrounding a flame with a whirlpool within in
